name: Amazon
description: Convert Amazon invoices to CSV or Excel format instantly. Extract order details, line items, and tax information from your Amazon business invoices.
metaTitle: Amazon Invoice PDF to Excel Converter — Extract Line Items | BillToSheet
metaDescription: Convert Amazon invoices to CSV and Excel format. Extract all order details, line items, and tax information from Amazon EU and US invoices automatically.
exportSteps: Log in to your Amazon Seller Central account
Navigate to Reports > Payments > Transaction View
Select the date range for your invoices
Click 'Download' to export invoices as PDF
Upload the PDF to our converter tool above
commonIssues: Amazon invoice date formats vary by region (DD/MM/YYYY vs MM/DD/YYYY)
Multi-currency invoices may show amounts in different currencies
Amazon Business invoices include additional tax breakdowns
FBA fees are sometimes listed separately from product costs
Refund invoices have negative amounts that need special handling

faqs.question: How do I convert Amazon invoices to CSV?
faqs.answer: Simply upload your Amazon invoice PDF using our converter tool. Our system will automatically extract all relevant data including order numbers, dates, items, prices, and taxes, then generate downloadable CSV and Excel files.

faqs.question: Can I convert multiple Amazon invoices at once?
faqs.answer: Yes! Sign in to your dashboard and use our bulk conversion feature to upload and process multiple Amazon invoices simultaneously. All files process concurrently for maximum speed, and you'll see live progress updates for each invoice.

faqs.question: What Amazon invoice formats are supported?
faqs.answer: We support Amazon invoices from all regions including Amazon.com, Amazon.co.uk, Amazon.de, and other Amazon marketplaces in standard PDF format.

faqs.question: How do I download invoices from Amazon Seller Central?
faqs.answer: Go to Reports > Payments > Transaction View in Seller Central, select your date range, and click Download. The invoices will be in PDF format ready for conversion.

faqs.question: Does the converter handle Amazon FBA fees?
faqs.answer: Yes, our converter extracts all FBA fees including fulfillment fees, storage fees, and removal order fees, and includes them as separate line items in your CSV output.

faqs.question: Can I convert Amazon Business invoices?
faqs.answer: Yes, our tool supports both regular Amazon invoices and Amazon Business invoices, including the additional tax information and business-specific fields.

faqs.question: What if my Amazon invoice has multiple currencies?
faqs.answer: Our converter preserves all currency information and creates separate line items for each currency, making it easy to reconcile multi-currency transactions.

name: Stripe
description: Convert Stripe invoices to CSV or Excel. Extract payment details, subscription information, and transaction data from Stripe invoices effortlessly.
metaTitle: Stripe Invoice PDF to Excel Converter — Extract Line Items | BillToSheet
metaDescription: Convert Stripe invoices to CSV and Excel. Extract payment details, subscription data, and transaction information from Stripe invoices automatically.
exportSteps: Log in to your Stripe Dashboard
Navigate to Invoices in the left sidebar
Click on the invoice you want to export
Click the 'Download PDF' button
Upload the downloaded PDF to our converter above
commonIssues: Stripe invoice PDFs sometimes have subscription details split across pages
Tax calculations vary by country and may need manual verification
Failed payment invoices show different formatting
Subscription prorations can be complex to parse
Multi-currency invoices require currency conversion tracking
uniqueFields: Stripe invoice ID and charge ID

faqs.question: How does the Stripe invoice converter work?
faqs.answer: Upload your Stripe invoice PDF and our tool will extract all payment details, subscription information, line items, and tax data, converting it into structured CSV and Excel formats.

faqs.question: Is my Stripe invoice data secure?
faqs.answer: Yes, we process invoices securely and don't store your original PDF files. Conversion results are retained for 30 days for logged-in users, then automatically deleted.

faqs.question: Can I convert Stripe subscription invoices?
faqs.answer: Yes, our converter handles both one-time payment invoices and recurring subscription invoices, extracting subscription IDs, billing periods, and proration details.

faqs.question: How do I download invoices from Stripe?
faqs.answer: In your Stripe Dashboard, go to Invoices, select the invoice you need, and click the Download PDF button. The PDF will be ready for conversion.

faqs.question: Does the converter extract Stripe fees?
faqs.answer: Yes, our tool extracts all Stripe processing fees and displays them as separate line items, making it easy to track your payment processing costs.

faqs.question: Can I convert failed payment invoices?
faqs.answer: Yes, our converter handles both successful and failed payment invoices, preserving all transaction details including failure reasons.

faqs.question: What if my Stripe invoice has prorations?
faqs.answer: Our converter extracts proration amounts and explains them in the CSV output, showing both the original and prorated amounts for subscription changes.

faqs.answer: Yes, chargeback and refund amounts are extracted as separate line items with negative values, making it easy to track disputes and reversals.

faqs.question: What about Adyen interchange fees?
faqs.answer: Our converter extracts interchange fees, scheme fees, and other processing costs when they appear as line items in your Adyen documents.

faqs.question: Does the tool work with Adyen payout reports?
faqs.answer: Yes, payout reports and settlement summaries are supported. We extract payout dates, amounts, and fee breakdowns into structured CSV format.

faqs.question: Can I convert Adyen invoices from multiple merchant accounts?
faqs.answer: Yes, upload each settlement report separately or use bulk conversion to process invoices from multiple Adyen merchant accounts simultaneously.

name: Magento

Configurable products may show parent and child SKUs separately
Multi-store setups can have different invoice formats

faqs.question: How do I convert Magento invoices to CSV?
faqs.answer: Upload your Magento invoice PDF and our tool will extract order details, product line items, customer information, shipping, and tax data into CSV and Excel formats.

faqs.question: Does the converter work with Adobe Commerce?
faqs.answer: Yes, Adobe Commerce (formerly Magento Commerce) uses the same invoice structure. Our converter works with invoices from both Magento Open Source and Adobe Commerce.

faqs.question: How do I export invoices from Magento?
faqs.answer: In Magento Admin, go to Sales > Orders, select an order, create or view the invoice, then use Print or a PDF extension to save as PDF. Upload to our converter.

faqs.question: Does the converter handle Magento configurable products?
faqs.answer: Yes, our tool extracts configurable product details including parent SKU, selected options, and variant-specific pricing when shown in the invoice.

faqs.question: Can I convert Magento multi-store invoices?
faqs.answer: Yes, invoices from any Magento store view are supported. Store-specific formatting and tax rules are preserved in the extracted data.

faqs.question: What about Magento gift cards and store credit?
faqs.answer: Gift card usage and store credit applied to orders are extracted when they appear as line items or payment methods on the invoice.

faqs.question: Does the tool work with Magento 2?
faqs.answer: Yes, our converter works with Magento 2 and Adobe Commerce invoices. The invoice structure is consistent across Magento 2 versions.
